definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
lotus flower (Nelumbo nucifera Gaertn, among others)/water-lily
Sandy Lam (1966-), Hong Kong pop singer
Hualien, city and county on the east coast of Taiwan
Pan Jinlian (name lit. Golden Lotus), heroine of Ming dynasty vernacular novel Jinpingmei or the Golden Lotus 金瓶梅
Lianhu District of Xi’an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi

Hualien County on the east coast of Taiwan

sentences.english: So Manasseh and Ephraim, the descendants of Joseph, received their inheritance.
sentences.chinese: 约瑟的儿子玛拿西，以法莲就得了他们的地业。

sentences.english: Of the tribe of Ephraim, Oshea the son of Nun.
sentences.chinese: 属以法莲支派的有嫩的儿子何希阿。

sentences.english: That wreath, the pride of Ephraim 's drunkards, will be trampled underfoot.
sentences.chinese: 以法莲的醉汉所戴的高傲冠冕，必被践踏在脚下。

sentences.english: She says she enjoys planting smaller ones like snowdrop bulbs.
sentences.chinese: 她说她很喜欢像雪花莲种植规模较小的灯泡。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To develop a method for identification and analysis of the unknown toxic herbal medicinal powders: Dysosma pleiantha(Hance) Woodson.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究未知有毒中药粉末六角莲的鉴定与分析方法。

sentences.english: All the time, you are the lotus in full bloom in the charming Jiangnan.
sentences.chinese: 一直以来，你都是莲，盛开在迷人的江南。

sentences.english: The army marched into the field to fight Israel, and the battle took place in the forest of Ephraim.
sentences.chinese: 兵就出到田野迎着以色列人，在以法莲树林里交战。

sentences.english: Kemuel son of Shiphtan, the leader from the tribe of Ephraim son of Joseph;
sentences.chinese: 以法莲支派有一个首领，拾弗但的儿子基母利。

sentences.english: On the south the land belonged to Ephraim, on the north to Manasseh.
sentences.chinese: 南归以法莲，北归玛拿西，以海为界。

sentences.english: The red lotus, the dense rain, played around Qi oblique.
sentences.chinese: 那朵红莲，被那繁密的雨点，打得左右攲斜。

sentences.english: O Ephraim, what shall I do unto thee?
sentences.chinese: 主说，以法莲哪，我可向你怎样行呢。

sentences.english: The descendants of Joseph by their clans through Manasseh and Ephraim were
sentences.chinese: 按着家族，约瑟的儿子有玛拿西，以法莲。

sentences.english: And by the border of Manasseh, from the east side unto the west side, a portion for Ephraim.
sentences.chinese: 挨着玛拿西的地界，从东到西，是以法莲的一分。

sentences.english: Then Jeroboam fortified Shechem in the hill country of Ephraim and lived there.
sentences.chinese: 耶罗波安在以法莲山地建筑示剑，就住在其中。

sentences.english: And all the people shall know, even Ephraim and the inhabitant of Samaria, that say in the pride and stoutness of heart
sentences.chinese: 这众百姓，就是以法莲和撒玛利亚的居民，都要知道。

sentences.english: In Chinese literature, there are much more lotus-related poetries.
sentences.chinese: 在中国文学里，与莲有关的诗词歌赋，更是不计其数。

definition: lotus flower (Nelumbo nucifera Gaertn, among others)/water-lily
abbr. for 梵教[Fan4 jiao4] Brahmanism/abbr. for Sanskrit 梵語|梵语[Fan4 yu3] or 梵文[Fan4 wen2]/abbr. for 梵蒂岡|梵蒂冈[Fan4 di4 gang1], the Vatican
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
hibiscus/cotton rose (Hibiscus mutabilis)/lotus/foo yung (Chinese dish similar to an omelet)
Furong district of Changsha city 長沙市|长沙市[Chang2 sha1 shi4], Hunan/Seremban, capital of Sembilan state 森美蘭|森美兰[Sen1 mei3 lan2], Malaysia
white lotus (flower)/White Lotus society/same as 白蓮教|白莲教
narcissus/daffodil/legendary aquatic immortal/refers to those buried at sea/person who wanders abroad and does not return
